#summary API

= Dependencies =

  * jquery.core  

= API version 1.0 =

== jquery.ui.map core ==

===Constructor===

|| *Constructor* || *Return value* || *Description* || 
|| gmap(opts?:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427603.aspx MapOptions]) || none || Creates a new map. MapOptions is extended with an optional callback method, i.e. { 'callback':function() { } }, invoked after the map has been loaded || 

===Methods===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| addBounds([http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427612.aspx Location]) || none || Adds a bound to the existing boundaries. ||
|| addControl(panel:jquery/node/string, position:int) || none || Creates a control from the given div panel on the map. ||
|| addMarker(opts?:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427629.aspx PushpinOptions], callback?:function(map:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], marker:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx Pushpin])) || $([http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx Pushpin])  || Creates a marker on the map. PushpinOptions is extended with a bounds property ('bounds':boolean) to add boundaries  ||
|| find (type:string, object:{property/value/delimiter}, callback:function(object:object, isFound:boolean)) || none || Find e.g. marker(s) by property ||
|| inViewport(marker:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Marker Marker]) || boolean || If a markers LatLng is visible in the viewport ||
|| get(name:string, obj?:object) || object || Returns object by name. The optional obj parameter is set if the name does not exist.  ||
|| set(name:string, obj:object) || object || Stores an object by name ||
|| addInfoWindow(opts:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg675210.aspx InfoboxOptions], marker:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx Pushpin]) || none || Opens an info box bound to the marker on the map. ||
|| openInfoWindow(opts:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg675210.aspx InfoboxOptions], marker:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx Pushpin]) || none || Opens an info box bound to the marker on the map. ||
|| load(key:string, options:object, isLoadedCallback:function) || none || Loads the specified registered module, making its functionality available. An optional function can be specified that is called when the module is loaded. The following Bing Maps modules are available: Microsoft.Maps.Directions, Microsoft.Maps.Traffic, Microsoft.Maps.VenueMaps ||
|| register(key:string, url:string, options:object) || none || Registers a module with the map control. The name of the module is specified in key, the module script is defined in scriptUrl, and the options provides the location of a *.css file to load with the module. Once you have registered a module, you can make its functionality available by loading it using load. ||
|| clear(name:string) || none || Removes a property list by name, e.g. markers, services, overlays ||
|| destroy() || none || Removes the map functionality. ||

== Events ==

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| triggerEvent(type:string) || none || Trigger an event, e.g. 'resize'. ||
|| addEventListener(type:string, callback:function()) || none || Adds a Google event listener or binds a jQuery event||

|| *Event* || *Description* || *Supported elements* || 
|| click || Adds a click event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| rightclick || Adds a right click event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| dblclick || Adds a double click event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| mouseover || Adds a mouse over event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| mouseout || Adds a mouse out event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| drag || Adds a drag event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||
|| dragend || Adds a drag end event. || [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427609.aspx Map], [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427615.aspx PushPin]||

== jquery.ui.map overlays ==

===Methods===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| addShape(shape:string, opts:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427595.aspx PolylineOptions]/[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg427596.aspx PolygonOptions]) || none || Adds an overlay, depending on the shape: 'Polygon', 'Polyline', 'Rectangle', 'Circle'. ||

== jquery.ui.map services ==

===Methods===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| loadDirections(request:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh312839.aspx DirectionsRequest], callback:function(result:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg636957.aspx DirectionsResult], DirectionsStatus:OK/ERROR/ZERO_RESULTS)) || none || Returns directions. ||
|| displayDirections(request:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh312839.aspx DirectionsRequest], opts:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh312832.aspx DirectionsRendererOptions]) || none || Displays directions on the map and/or in a div panel. ||
|| search(request: {address: 'Stockholm', location: Microsoft.Maps.Location}, callback:function(result:[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff701714.aspx GeocoderResult], status:DirectionsStatus:OK/ERROR/ZERO_RESULTS)) || none || Search addresses and latitude/longitude. ||

== jquery.ui.map rdfa/microformat/microdata ==

=== Methods ===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| rdfa(namespace:string, callback:function(object:object, item:$(node), index:int)) || none || Iterates through selected RDFa. ||
|| microdata(namespace:string, callback:function(object:object, item:$(node), index:int)) || none || Iterates through selected microdata. ||
|| microformat(namespace:string, callback:function(object:object, item:$(node), index:int)) || none || Iterates through selected microformat. ||
